feed.title: Miklb’s Mindless Ramblings
feed.subtitle: Chronicling life in a digital world. Touching on web dev, food, and a little of everything in between.

entry.content: Found a new bookmarklet for identifying font family, size, style etc Fount https://fount.artequalswork.com
entry.summary: Found a new bookmarklet for identifying font family, size, style etc Fount https://fount.artequalswork.com

entry.content: Biggest mistake I think Jekyll made was conflating post/page with multiple/single but still recognizing page as outside chronological order.
entry.summary: Biggest mistake I think Jekyll made was conflating post/page with multiple/single but still recognizing page as outside chronological order.

entry.content: I’m developing a perverse pleasure in using Liquid markup language.
entry.summary: I’m developing a perverse pleasure in using Liquid markup language.

entry.content: First time using Watermelon radish. Won't be last.

entry.content: Been using Safari w/o Flash for a while now. Interesting to see HTML5 media players growth. Music player @npr really well done.
entry.summary: Been using Safari w/o Flash for a while now. Interesting to see HTML5 media players growth. Music player @npr really well done.

entry.content: “It's not the details themselves, it's the deliberate paying attention to them that makes the difference.” @ideasinfood http://blog.ideasinfood.com/ideas_in_food/2016/07/bone-in-striped-bass-loin.html
